con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description: Returns single book object based on ID GETs a single book object.

con:method.name: DELETE
con:method.con:description: Deletes a created book based by ID - does not support name. Returns deleted object. DELETEs book object

con:method.name: PATCH
con:method.con:description: Updates a created book based by ID - does not support name. Returns deleted object. PATCHs book object
